Package com.example1.locationapp

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseActivity
    this class is the base of the mainActivity It has the frame action bar when you pull the action bar the list view will refreshed
    BuildConfig  
    ChoseImageActivity
    In this ChoseImageActivity there are two main things to do 1.take Image want you want add image into the app you can choose take the image then it will give the camron then you can take by yourself.
    CommentComparator
    this is for Sorting to comments by compare it with itself.
    CustomAdapter
    custom list view adapter for making a list view adapter
    CustomAdapter.ViewHolder
    create a view holder for list view view item
    cutadapter
    custom listview adapter for making a listview adapter
    cutadapter.ViewHolder
    Make the view for listview
    EditActivity
    EditActivity is using for user who want to edit his/her own comments.
    EditActivity.PlaceholderFragment
    A placeholder fragment containing a simple view.
    EnterCommentsActivity
    EnterCommentActivity class takes user input as master comment which will be shown in the Main activity
    EnterCommentsActivityProduct
    refacter activiy
    Favourite
    Favorite is for user saving their favorite comment when you phone is off line you can also view the favorite part.
    GPSTracker
    open source code from http://www.androidhive.info/2012/07/android-gps-location-manager-tutorial/
    GPSTrackerContent
    class for GPSTrackerContent reference from the open source code from http://www.androidhive.info/2012/07/android-gps-location-manager-tutorial/
    InternetChecker
    This class will check the if the Internet service in on or not.
    ListViewActivity
    This class manage the functionality in the mainActivity, which shows the listView all comments.
    ListViewActivity.SimpleListFragment
    the SimpleListFragment class is used to control start the listView, pull to refresh and shows on the activity;
    MainActivity
    this is Main display page for the app which shows main comments of the application and user may edit comments, change location
    MainPage
    main page is giving two options for user to use to application.
    MySuggestionProvider
    This activity is using for searching by date.
    NewProfileActivity
    This activity is using for create the profile of a user then other user can check each other's information in the profile.
    NewProfileActivity.PlaceholderFragment
    A placeholder fragment containing a simple view.
    NewUserActivity
    NewUserActivity take user input user name allowing user to continue to use the application.
    Playtube
    This class is to change location on the bit map in the application;
    ProfileActivity
    for user owner or other user to watch the information of the user.
    ProfileActivity.PlaceholderFragment
    A placeholder fragment containing a simple view.

    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.color

    R.layout

    R.xml  
    SearchActivity
    This activity for user search the comment by time.
    SearchActivity.PlaceholderFragment
    A placeholder fragment containing a simple view.
    SubCommetsRead
    this class is to control the sub-comments part It will find sub-comment of the master comment
    SubFavourite
    This activity for user's off line's sub-comments.
    TagActivity
    This acitvity for user add Tag in the and searching by tag
    TagActivity.PlaceholderFragment
    A placeholder fragment containing a simple view.
